title: Conspiracy Theories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/28/20
itunes:title: Conspiracy Theories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/28/20
description:
George Noory and author Chris Vola discuss his research into conspiracy theories and if they are actually true, why people believe them, and examine some of the most popular conspiracy theories including the flat Earth theory, the illuminati, and whether Elvis Presley could still be alive.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
